extendedInfo.description: Epic Movie brings cinematic effects in your hands. It Is the best and only 100% free app that allows to direct your own hollywood Inspired action movie using your Android.Here's how it works:1) Choose your desired FX.2) Record your movie.3) Epic Movie does the rest.4) Enjoy & impress your friends.Available FX:* Bazooka Attack* Copter Crash (helicopter)* Hell Fire Bombardment* Missile Attack* Plane Crash* Tornado Destruction* & more extreme fx coming soonNOTE:Due to different native camera implementations on each device it's very difficult to make this app work flawlessly on every device. However, please be assured that developers look at each bug report and try to fix it ASAP. In the meanwhile please be patient and polite ;) If you want to help then drop us an email and we will try to get it working on your device. Please, refrain from giving poor rating in case of a bug as it only discourages developers.Sit back and enjoy; Bug fixes and new effects are on their way.Best Regards,SufiStudios Team

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: When you record it overwrites the old file with the new one. Bummer!! Also cant pinpoint wen effect would take place when recording but its the best ive found so far
reviews.author: Heracleo Elbi\303\261a Jr.

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: I can only get the missle effect to work all others say video cannot be played? Sorry I wont rate something good thats not? This is poor aww did I hurt the developers feelings? TS!  Problem is obvious to me how many reviews mention video cannot be played??? Droid bionic
reviews.author: pete harty

reviews.title: samsung galaxy note
reviews.comment: Epic fail!! Fails....can\'t play video it says.  I wanted it after seeing similar app in an Ipod. Hope to see it fixed........ I\'ll leave it installed 4 now in hopes an update may fix it.... Enough time has passed, no update, removing it as it eats up 43 mb. Guess i need an Ipod Lol:);) updated--aug2013--guess they don\'t want to fix it. Go with FXGuru..
reviews.author: Glenn Hoffman

reviews.title: Nice App but need improvement
reviews.comment: Very nice app but the GUI is kinda old style also need more Animation and High Quality Video Rec. will give 5star if new version get more feature and Animation.
reviews.author: \304\220ark Moyan

reviews.title: Major bug!!
reviews.comment: When I record and finish it says can\'t play this clip i downloaded many movie player hoping it will work and still not working it needs to be fixed... I am leaving it for now hoping dor update...

reviews.title: It does not work
reviews.comment: Plz. Fix it for android ROMs 4.2 because it crashes every time when I start recording.

reviews.title: Very buggy
reviews.comment: After using FxGuru for a long time I was looking forward to trying something new. Unfortunately this app is so buggy is basically unusable. When you finally get a video rendered it\'s transparent so you can see that what you blew is still there.
reviews.author: Will Hourihan

reviews.title: Have a long way to 5 stars
reviews.comment: I have a sensation and can only get one effect to work. Rating it a 2 only because is a great concept. Uninstalling until the app works like it is supposed to.

reviews.title: Motorola Android
reviews.comment: This app is garbage!  The only time it worked was right right after I loaded it, but after that it always says the video cannot be played.  It has not worked since that very first time.
reviews.author: Michael Gorman

reviews.title: Works half the time
reviews.comment: Only 2 out of the videos work. Unfortunately the 2 videos that work are the lamest ones on here. Until you fix your only get 1 star. What a disappointment
reviews.author: Anthony Lockett

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: It\'s working fine for me. At first it didn\'t work but when I tried it the 2nd time it finally worked. You should add a timer so that we could know the exact duration of the video. Cool app but need more polishing.

reviews.title: Nope
reviews.comment: Im only rated 5 so we can get some call of duty black ops 2 effects.... now that would be COOL.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I like the app but I wish android can have the same as the action movie app on iPhone. It does freeze a lot and doesn\'t upload more than half the time so  some fixing is needed.  Needs more action scenes like on the iPhone.
